title: The Golden Fleece
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Beer/Wine, British, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Welcoming, traditional pub serving a range of made-in-house home-style meals and light bites. Vegan choices include 5 main dishes and 3 sandwiches. A good portion of the rest of the menu can be made vegan. Also vegan are 7 lagers and ciders on draft, and 5 bottled varieties. Free Cloud Wi-Fi. Has live music.
